title: Giới thiệu về Karel
content:
Karel là một robot sống trong một thế giới nhỏ, bằng việc gọi các câu lệnh, người dùng có thể để cho robot thực hiện các tác vụ đơn giản như di chuyển, đổi hướng, thu thập vật phẩm, đặt vật phẩm.
Các bạn có thể thử nghiệm robot Karel bên dưới:
World: Karel is in a world that has 2 rows and 2 columns. There is a wall between row 1 column 1 and row 2 column 1. The beepers are placed as follows: 1 beeper at row 1, column 2. Karel is standing on row 1 and column 1, facing East. Karel’s front is clear, left is blocked, and right is blocked.
Karel moved one step forward and is now at row 1 and column 2, facing East. There is 1 beeper here. Karel’s front is blocked, left is clear, and right is blocked.Karel turned left and is now facing North.Karel picked a beeper up. There are now 0 beepers here.Karel put a beeper down. There is now 1 beeper here.Karel turned left and is now facing West.Karel turned left and is now facing South.Karel turned left and is now facing East.Karel turned left and is now facing North.Karel turned left and is now facing West.Karel turned left and is now facing South.Karel turned left and is now facing East.Karel picked a beeper up. There are now 0 beepers here.Karel turned left and is now facing North.Karel turned left and is now facing West.Karel turned left and is now facing South.Karel turned left and is now facing East.Karel turned left and is now facing North.Karel moved one step forward and is now at row 2 and column 2, facing North. There are 0 beepers here. Karel’s front is blocked, left is clear, and right is blocked.Karel turned left and is now facing West.Karel turned left and is now facing South.Karel turned left and is now facing East.Karel turned left and is now facing North.Karel turned left and is now facing West.Karel moved one step forward and is now at row 2 and column 1, facing West. There are 0 beepers here. Karel’s front is blocked, left is blocked, and right is blocked.Karel put a beeper down. There is now 1 beeper here. Goal: Karel is in a world that has 2 rows and 2 columns. There is a wall between row 1 column 1 and row 2 column 1. The beepers are placed as follows: 1 beeper at row 2, column 1. Karel is standing on row 2 and column 1, facing West. Karel’s front is blocked, left is blocked, and right is blocked.

title: Tóm tắt
content:
Đây là bản ghi chép cho khóa học CS106A của Đại học Stanford.
CS106A là khóa học giới thiệu về các kỹ thuật xây dựng ứng dụng máy tính, tập trung vào các nguyên tắc kỹ thuật phần mềm hiện đại: thiết kế hướng đối tượng (object-oriented design), phân rã (decomposition), đóng gói (encapsulation), trừu tượng hóa (abstraction) và kiểm thử (testing).
Các ví dụ trong chuỗi bài này sử dụng ngôn ngữ lập trình Java.
